title: Animal & Bird Encounters
descriptionText: Enjoy a daily show of delightful tricks and antics by our exotic birds, mischievous macaques and other adorable small animals at Palawan Amphitheatre at Palawan Beach.
descriptionText_zh_SG: 走进巴拉湾海滩上的巴拉湾剧场，观看由我们珍奇鸟儿、顽皮猕猴以及其他可爱的小动物们所带来的精彩日常表演。
admission: Free
admission_zh_SG: 免费
openingTimes_zh_SG: 每日演出自下午 2点，三点和五点。

title: AZZURA Beach Club
descriptionText: Enjoy high energy hydro sports activities, sumptuous bistro and more at the new premier beachfront entertainment club.

title: Butterfly Park & Insect Kingdom
descriptionText: Marvel at 1,500 live butterflies ( from over 50 species ) fluttering around you at this cool outdoor conservatory. Home to 3,000 species of the most beautiful and rarest insects, it is one of Asia's largest collections.
descriptionText_zh_SG: 在这凉爽的户外温室内，1,500只蝴蝶（超过50种）在您身边翩翩飞舞，令人惊叹。这里是亚洲最大的博物馆之一，有3000种最美丽稀有的昆虫居住于此。
admission: S$16 / Adult S$10 / Child (3 - 12 years old)

title: Sentosa 4D AdventureLand
descriptionText:
Home to UNLIMITED FUN! Go on in an immersive 4-D movie, NEW: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island, The 4-D Experience. Next, Hang On Tight as you ride on a virtual 4-D roller coaster “Extreme Log Ride” and Grab a motion-sensor pistol, aim and fire at Asia’s first 4-D Interactive Shoot-Out game happening at “Desperados”.

NEW RIDE! - "Pirates"  Returns
Follow the hilarious misadventures of Captain Lucky and his band of pirates in search of hidden treasure! There’s danger everywhere! This swashbuckling adventure is a thrilling journey from start to finish, with traps, swampy forest, bats in a dark cave, angry hornets and many surprises galore! 

Be tossed about in your seats. Feel the wind blowing in your face and the water rushing your way. Let the synchronization of this wide spectrum of special visual, sound, motion and environmental effects put you right in the middle of the action.
descriptionText_zh_SG:
带来无限欢乐的游园！进入身临其境的 4D 电影，全新推出： Journey 2: The Mysterious Island， 惊险刺激的 4D 体验。接下来，要抓紧喽！因为您要在虚拟世界中乘坐 4D 过山车 “Extreme Log Ride”。继而在亚洲首个 4D 互动枪战游戏 “Desperados” 中抓起动作传感器手枪，向敌人开火！新旅程！踢踏小企鹅波波的疯狂之旅！在圣淘沙 4D 探险乐园和波波与他欢腾的企鹅朋友们一起来一场刺激的4-D 短途旅行，在这令人屏息的寒冷冒险中以心跳胆寒的超快速度冲刺吧！

4D缆车乘坐新体验！哈尔•乔丹（瑞恩•雷诺兹饰）极不情愿地成为了绿灯侠军团的最新成员，作为一支星际级别的超级英雄队伍，所有成员都要接受训练，成为宇宙的守卫者。

当哈尔•乔丹学习通过掌控自己的意志力来控制恐惧时，他很快发现自己要面对 Parallax，一个以恐惧为能量的残酷外星势力。

哈尔足以赢得绿灯侠的称号吗？他能成功阻止 Parallax 毁灭地球吗？

圣淘沙欢乐易通卡 – 
全部3个4D探险乐园景点在一日、精选和夜间欢乐易通卡中均内含。
每个景点分开兑换。

title: Fort Siloso
descriptionText:
Magnificently restored, Fort Siloso Tours is the largest repository of World War II memorabilia. 

FREE Guided Tours available on Fridays, Saturdays, Sundays and Public Holidays. (12.30pm and 3.30pm)

Notice:
The Playground area and Tunnel C are undergoing upgrading works, and will re-open in July 2015.

title: Gogreen Cycle & Island Explorer
descriptionText:
Explore Sentosa all over again with Sentosa Island explorer! A guided tour around the island where our guides will bring you to must see sights and through lesser travelled paths, opening your eyes to places you never knew existed.  An experience you will not want to miss!

Alternatively, you can pick up a bicycle and explore Sentosa at your own pace. Choose from our array of bicycles such as Hybrid bicycles for an effortless ride, Bi-pedal bicycle, Tandem bicycles and even Rosie bicycles for the little ones. 

Minimum height of 140cm applies only for Sentosa Island Explorer and not for rentals
descriptionText_zh_SG: 圣淘沙环岛探游，全岛走透透！此番探游将带您前往本岛必观著名景点，穿过一些人迹罕至的小道，观赏那些前所未知的地方。相信您一定不舍得错过这样一种美妙的体验！或者，您还可以租上一辆自行车，自由安排环岛游的进程，轻松畅游圣淘沙！我们提供各种自行车，例如，您可以挑选混合动力自行车，骑上他您一身轻松，您也可以选择双脚踏板自行车、双人自行车或者适合小朋友的罗茜自行车。圣淘沙环岛探游最低身高需140公分，不针对租车服务

title: Images of Singapore LIVE
descriptionText:
Fun, interactive and theatrical, Images of Singapore LIVE takes you on a journey to uncover the nation’s extraordinary story! 

Through a unique mix of live actors and special effects, get ready to step back in time to Singapore's past from a humble Malay fishing village to 21st century powerhouse. Experience the sights, smells and sounds of yesteryear before you embark on the final part of your journey with a voyage aboard The Spirit of Singapore – an all new boat ride that celebrates everything unique about Singapore.

Notice:
The Spirit of Singapore boat ride will be closed for maintenance from 18 – 20 May 2015.
descriptionText_zh_SG: 这全新翻新的万象新加坡LIVE把新加坡200年的历史搬入现场舞台。通过生动的现场演出和全新的视觉体验，游客可以了解新加坡如何从小渔村演变成21世纪的繁荣花园城市。除此之外，游客也可以搭乘一段奇幻的游船河之旅，与我们一起庆贺新加坡的人文历史与成就。
admission:

Adult: $38

descriptionText: Hop on the luge cart to either race down or leisurely cruise along a choice of 2 specially-designed paves trail - Dragon or Jungle Trail. Then, take the Skyride through a scenic 320m long tree-top ride back to the starting point to do it all over again.

title: Wings of Time
descriptionText:
Epic. Majestic. Mysterious. Discover a mesmerizing night show by the sea.

There's no better way to complete a fabulous day at Sentosa than to take in a spectacular night show set outdoors against the backdrop of an open sea. Come, discover an awe-inspiring display of water, laser and fire effects, set to majestic music and a panorama of breathtaking vistas. 

Weaved together by a tale of friendship and courage that will linger with you long after you leave our magical isle.

The Storyline:
Explore new dimensions with Shahbaz, a mystical pre-historic bird. Together with his friends, Rachel and Felix, they travel across beautiful landscapes and the mysteries of time. His friends discover more about the courage to be more than who they think they were.

At journey's end, will Shahbaz find home? Will a boy and girl find true friendship?
The story continues at Wings of Time!
descriptionText_zh_SG: 一段奇幻和穿梭时空的历险传奇，汇集了水幕立体投影、火焰和激光特效，营造出栩栩如生的场景和活灵活现的人物，将让你沉浸在前所未有的全新梦幻世界。

title: The Flying Trapeze
descriptionText: Learn to fly as Trapeze instructors have you sailing through the air in no time! Or watch on the ground as your friends and family conquer their fear of heights.

title: Sentosa Merlion
descriptionText: Discover the myths and legend of the Lion City and venture into the Merlion at Sentosa, Singapore's tallest icon at 37m high, and enjoy panoramic views of Sentosa and the surrounding islands.
descriptionText_zh_SG:
探索狮城的神话和传奇，进入圣淘沙鱼尾狮探险，造访37米高的新加坡地标，让您欣赏圣淘沙和周围岛屿全景。
圣淘沙欢乐易通卡：一日、精选、夜间、两日欢乐易通卡和优质欢乐易通卡（新加坡风采四合一组合）中内含。

title: Tiger Sky Tower
descriptionText: Get a great view from 131m above sea level at the revolving Tiger Sky Tower, Asia's tallest observatory tower. Take in fabulous 360 views of the surrounding Singapore skyline and neighbouring islands from its vantage point.
descriptionText_zh_SG:
站在旋转的 Tiger 摩天塔——亚洲最高的观景塔从海平面 131 米的高空望去，美景尽收眼底。新加坡周围的天际与邻近的岛屿令人叹为观止的360度全景，从这一有利位置一览无余。
圣淘沙欢乐易通卡：一日、精选、夜间和两日欢乐易通卡中内含。

title: Underwater World Singapore
title_zh_SG: 新加坡海底世界和海豚乐园
descriptionText: Get up close and be dazzled by the wealth of marine life via an 83 metre long tunnel at the Underwater World oceanarium. Then, make friends with the friendly pink dolphins and fur seals and watch them frolic with their trainers at Dolphin Lagoon!
descriptionText_zh_SG:
踏上新加坡海底世界83米长的海底隧道，近距离探索深海宫殿，丰富的海洋生物令人目不暇接。踏进海豚乐园，您还将与友好的粉红海豚与毛茸茸的海豹建立友谊，欣赏他们与训练员们合作奉献的精彩、逗趣的表演。
圣淘沙欢乐易通卡：优质欢乐易通卡中内含。

title: Universal Studios Singapore®
descriptionText: Universal Studios Singapore®Go beyond the screen and Ride The Movies™ at Universal Studios Singapore. Only here can you experience cutting-edge rides, shows and attractions based on your favourite blockbuster films and television series, including TRANSFORMERS The Ride: The Ultimate 3D Battle, Sesame Street Spaghetti Space Chase, Shrek 4-D Adventure, Jurassic Park Rapids Adventure™, and more!
descriptionText_zh_SG: 到访新加坡环球影城，身历其境，体验电影™！ 新加坡环球影城拥有多项顶尖独特的游乐设施与景点，融汇电影主题的崭新项目及表演，其中包括：变形金刚3D对决 之终极战斗、史瑞克4-D 影院、马达加斯加：木箱漂流记、侏罗纪河流探险等！

title: Wave House Sentosa
descriptionText:
Wave House Sentosa, the most iconic in a global family of Wave House venues, is the place to experience the Californian beach lifestyle with high-­‐adrenaline flowboarding on the world famous Double FlowRider® and 10-­‐foot FlowBarrel® wave rides. 

Chill out to the beat of awesome live music as you savor modern Californian– Asian cuisine at the Wave House Sentosa Restaurant + Bar or cool off from the tropical heat and mingle with some of the most attractive people on the island at the outdoor Barrel and Rider Beach Bars.
descriptionText_zh_SG:
圣淘沙冲浪区在全球冲浪场所中堪称最具象征性的顶级冲浪点，在这里您可以体验加利福尼亚风情的海滨生活方式，感受世界著名的Double FlowRider® 以及 10 英尺的壮观 FlowBarrel® 带来的极具震撼力的冲浪刺激感。您还可以休闲惬意地在冲浪区的餐馆或酒吧中一边聆听美妙的现场音乐一边享用加利福尼亚或亚洲风味的美食，或与岛屿上最富魅力的人群在户外 Barrel and Rider B海滨酒吧中打成一片，驱散热带天气的炎热。

圣淘沙欢乐易通卡：

title: FestiveWalk™
descriptionText: Feast your senses on a world of non-stop entertainment, signature shopping experiences and culinary adventures at FestiveWalk™, and take pleasure in the comfort and luxury of the resort's unique world-class hotels.
admission: Free

title: Mount Imbiah
descriptionText: Take a short detour to the summit of Mount Imbiah to see the impressive remnants of a British pre-World War II gun emplacement, abandoned in the 1930s.
admission: Free

title: Crane Dance™
descriptionText: Watch the magical love story between a pair of mechanical cranes and how their love for each other transforms them into real birds.
admission: Free
openingTimes: Click on the link at the bottom of the page for showtime!

title: Lake of Dreams™
descriptionText: Flaming dragons, water cannons, and laser special effects, all in a spectacular show. This free entertainment spectacle, located close to the Casino at the heart of FestiveWalk™ , dramatically transforms the strip from day to night.
admission: Free

title: Merlion Plaza
descriptionText: Get your cameras ready and have your picture taken with the 37 metres high Merlion at the fun-filled Merlion Plaza!
admission: Free

title: Sentosa Boardwalk
descriptionText: You can now travel into Sentosa on foot via the Sentosa Boardwalk. It's a leisurely stroll from VivoCity Shopping Mall's waterfront promenade, made easy by two-way canopy-covered travellators.
admission:

title: Sentosa Golf Club Singapore
descriptionText: Nestled on the south-eastern tip of Sentosa, Singapore's resort island, lies the award-winning Sentosa Golf Club. Home to two of the region's most challenging golf courses - The Tanjong Course and The Serapong Course. Excellent meeting and banquet facilities for corporate networking as well as high-end dining options.

title: Combat Skirmish Live
descriptionText: Get your combat boots ready as Fort Siloso-Combat Skirmish LIVE brings Combat Laser Shooting to Fort Siloso! Train under Fort Siloso Battery Sergeant Major Cooper in the challenging Indoor Maze and help him battle against the enemy invasion in the historical fortress of Fort Siloso!
descriptionText_zh_SG:
穿好您的战靴，因为在西乐索炮台的炮台射击LIVE中您可以展开一场镭射枪战 ! 跟随西乐索炮台军长库珀在富有挑战性的室内迷宫中训练，并帮助他在西乐索炮台历史性的炮台中与入侵敌人战斗！

title: Port of Lost Wonder
descriptionText:
Port of Lost Wonder is Singapore's first kids' club by the Beach, designed to provide a unique family experience. Targeted at children aged 3 to 10 years old, the attraction houses a signature water play area, themed islets for picnics and leisure activities and distinctive retail and dining experiences. Together with a myriad of specially-designed activities aimed at satisfying wonder, curiosity and connection, it is here where families can come together to explore and discover new experiences and create unforgettable memories.

Notice:
Port of Lost Wonder will be closed for a private event on Saturday, 6 June 2015, from 1pm onwards.
descriptionText_zh_SG: 奇幻乐园是新加坡首个海边儿童俱乐部，专门提供独特的全家体验。为3到10岁儿童打造的奇幻乐园，这里有新颖有趣的水上游乐区、供野餐和休闲活动的主题岛，以及全新的购物用餐体验，专为儿童与童心未泯充满活力的人而提供。这里还有许多设计新颖的活动，旨在满足人们的好奇心，增进彼此关心，适合全家大小欢聚，探索新体验，共度难忘的时光。
admission:
Weekdays: $10/ child*
School Holidays, Weekends & Public Holidays: $15/ child*
Membership: $120/ year. 

*For children aged 12 and under. Parents will be granted free admission with a hug from your child!
openingTimes: 10am to 6.30pm daily (Water play area closes at 6pm)
openingTimes_zh_SG:
每天上午 10:00 至下午 6:30 
(水上游乐场于下午6:00 停止营业)

title: AZZURA Beach Club
descriptionText: The Azzura concept is the first of its kind in Asia. A multi-level entertainment, dining & hydrosports complex, Azzura is innovatively designed to maximize experiences; thus creating, and offering, a unique lifestyle experience to its guests. The Azzura Lifestyle is a personification of synergy between its never ending entertainment, sumptuous bistro dining and fast paced hydrosports activities, coupled together with the ambience echoed from the various beachfront settings, naturally presented during the span of any day.
openingTimes:
10am - 10pm (Mon - Fri) 
10am - 12mn (Sat, Sun, eve of and Public Holidays)

title: Bikini Bar
descriptionText:
Bringing the likes of Bali beach bars to our shores, Bikini Bar is Singapore's first and only
Bintang Bar! This upbeat and vibrant beach bar boasts a wide range of ice-cold beers,
cocktails and radio friendly tunes.
openingTimes:
Mon - Thu: 2:00 pm - 11:00 pm
Fri: 2:00 pm - 1:00 am
Sat: 11:00 am - 1:00 am
Sun: 11:00 am - 11:00 pm

title: Bistro 42
descriptionText: Bring down the temperature a few notches at this beach bar with a couple of daiquiris and the sounds of French and Latin jazz.

title: COASTES
descriptionText:
Situated along a golden stretch of Sentosa's Siloso Beach, Coastes beach bar offers a rustic
charm and casual, laid-back beach vibe where the sunbeds and deck chairs flow right to the
water's edge. This breezy beach bar serves premium beers, house pour spirits and hearty
beach food.

title: Sand Bar
descriptionText:
Siloso Beach has been re-defined! Nestled between swaying palm trees and an imposing art
structure, Sand Bar is as authentic as a beach bar gets. Crafted by renowned Indonesian artist,
Joko Dwi Avianto, the iconic bamboo structure surrounding it depicts the legend of The
Seven Dancing Princesses of Riau Island, from which the popular Malayan dance,
Olang-Olang, is derived. A truly unique and elegant experience in an unusual setting!

title: Tanjong Beach Club
descriptionText: Singapore's premier sun-kissed playground, Tanjong Beach Club (TBC) is a stunning amalgam of restaurant, bar, and the ultimate escape from our busy citystate. With a diverse range of activities and offerings, TBC is a getaway bringing back the simple pleasures in life within a sexy and sophisticated package. To top it off is the island's best brunch and food that features an unforgettable Warm Octopus Salad, Foie Gras Kaya Toast and a fresh selection of seafood grilled to perfection. At TBC, possibilities are limited only by the imagination and the water's edge.
openingTimes:
Tues - Fri: 
11:00am - 11:00pm (last order at 9.30pm) 
Sat - Sun: 
10:00am - 11:00pm (last order at 9.30pm) 
Sat, Sun & PH only: 
10:00am - 4.30pm (Brunch)

title: Bob's Bar (Capella Singapore)
descriptionText: Indulge in fruity drinks, homemade sodas, wines and spirits and Champagane. Bob's Bar is the perfect place to unwind and relax over signature cocktails and libations, all with a view of the sea.

title: Cool Stop
descriptionText: When you have very little time to stop and rest, this is the place where you can get 'convenient food' like chicken burgers, fish burgers, sotong balls and hotdogs. Asian specialty dessert - Ice Kachang can also be found here to cool you down from the hot shiny sun.

title: Chinatown Coffee Shop
descriptionText: Chinatown Coffee Shop provides quick bites, Asian & Western Cuisines to satisfy the taste buds of different races over the world. A must try when you come by the outlet: black pepper chicken rice, tasty salted fish fried rice, country style fish & chips and Katong Laksa!

title: Merlion Cafe
descriptionText: Savour traditional Singaporean coffee-shop fare at the Merlion Cafe! From the smell of freshly brewed coffee to the crunch of crisp toasted bread, savour authentic Singapore snacks here! This convenient “pick and go” style cafe is perfect for the busy attraction-hopper wanting to fill their tummies during the day.

title: Harry's @ Sentosa Cove
descriptionText: Harry's is a leading operator of premium bars in Singapore that offers a special blend of friendly service, sports viewing, delicious foods and a wide range of beers, wines, and spirits.
openingTimes:
11am - 1am (Mon - Thu & Sun) 
11am - 2am (Fri, Eve of Public Holidays & Public Holidays)

title: Hot Dog King
descriptionText: Tantalise your taste buds with the selections of chicken and cheese hotdogs, burgers and sandwiches. Grab a bite now!

title: Movenpick of Switerland (Palawan Beach)
descriptionText: It is '100% natural-100% pleasure' with ice cream flavours that comes from 100% natural essences.

title: Munch-It!
descriptionText: Take a welcome break from exploring the sights and sounds of the oceanarium with mouth-watering nibbles and a well-deserved cuppa.

title: Pezzo
descriptionText: Delicious crispy crust pizza hits the right spot at this little pizzeria, which also makes the dough onsite.

title: Ivy Restaurant
descriptionText: Ivy Restaurant is designed to provide a cosy and relaxed setting, with an al-fresco area that offers great view of the beach while enjoying Halal French fusion food served in a find dining presentation.
openingTimes:
Tuesday: 6pm - 10pm
Wednesday to Sunday: 
12pm - 2.30pm (Lunch); 6pm - 10pm (Dinner)
Closed on Mondays

title: Straits Express
descriptionText: Enjoy local desserts and a whole array of food and beverages at Straits Express!

title: The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf (Beach Station)
descriptionText: Enjoy a comprehensive range of origin coffee, blends, and roast styles as well as varieties of daily brew including the wonderful flavored pre-ground coffee with large offering of hugely popular cakes.

title: Cassia
descriptionText: Cassia invites you to celebrate the Renaissance in Chinese fine dining. Our modern Chinese restaurant, Cassia, takes inspiration from the age-old spice routes in Southern and Western China and the seas around Singapore.

title: il Lido Italian Dining & Lounge Bar
descriptionText: ilLido, Singapore’s most stylish Italian restaurant, presents the finest Italian cuisine and international wines to savour over while relishing the breathtaking views of golden seas, lush greens and tranquil skies. Perched atop a high cliff of Sentosa Island, the restaurant’s air of elegance indulges diners in a lavish and leisurely dining experience. The cuisine is led by renowned restaurateur Beppe De Vito and showcases Italian gastronomy at its best.
openingTimes:
Opens daily.
Lunch: 12 noon to 2:30pm 
Dinner: 6:30pm to 10.30pm

(With effect from 2 DEC 2013, il Lido will be closed on Mondays, except for Eve of Public Holidays and Public Holidays)

title: The Golfer's Terrace/The Deli
descriptionText: Golfer's Terrace at Sentosa Golf Club has a new look and new menu! Specially catered to golfers, the menu will comprise delicious and affordable quality but quick meals for both local and Asian cuisine.

title: KFC (Sentosa)
descriptionText: Craving for fried chicken? Head on down to the KFC outlet on Sentosa!

title: Sushi Kondo
descriptionText: Experience Japanese fine dining at its best at Sushi Kondo restaurant.  Located within the intimate settings of Sentosa Golf Club (SGC), the restaurant is helmed by Kondo Masayuki - Head Chef at Nogawa Restaurant from 2005 to 2012. Expect the freshest ingredients , including seasonal food that appear during special months. Accompanying all these delicious dishes is a choice of the finest sake. Sushi Kondo offers both attentive service and incomparable authentic fare . Private dining rooms are available on request.

title: Si Bon
descriptionText: Yet another upmarket dining option on Sentosa, Si Bon is a small Japanese restaurant that specialises in kushiage, with plans to introduce Japanese-French fusion cuisine in the future.

title: Shutters
descriptionText: Amara Sanctuary Resort's all day restaurant offers relaxed fine dining, focusing on modern intercontinental cuisines and impeccable service.

title: Suburbia
descriptionText: Set amidst lush greenery, this fine dining restaurant is charming and inviting. The food is focused on modern European and is generally good.
openingTimes:
Sun-Thu: 3pm - 11pm

title: Tastes of Asia

title: Chi, The Spa
descriptionText:
Soothe away the stresses of urban living at Chi, The Spa of Shangri-La's Rasa Sentosa Resort & Spa, a personal sanctuary where holistic treatments are based on time honoured methods shared by many Asian cultures. 

Three deluxe couple suites with a steam bath or whirlpool, seven single treatment rooms with shower facilities and an outdoor Thai pavilion which sits in a private garden perched over a fish pond and waterfall await. 

Luxurious yet down-to-earth, CHI, The Spa provides you with a place for personal peace and well-being. Intuitive skilled therapists with a caring touch rejuvenate and revitalise your body, mind and soul.

title: So Spa
descriptionText:
Ancient traditions from around the world meet the refinement and skill of the latest in French cosmetology to create So SPA, an exhilarating and rejuvenating experience. 

Awaken your senses and feel re-energized. Explore a new kind of spa experience with a wide range of poetic and surprising treatments.

Discover the ingredients that enhance your natural glow and make the stresses and strains of daily life fade away with our menu inspired by gastronomy.

Experience the benefits of Hammam traditions to complete your journey and achieve complete rejuvenation for your body and soul.

So SPA invites you to experience its garden paradise and healing properties perfectly blended with French skincare for an unforgettable spa experience in the lion city.

So SPA takes over Spa Botanica, which has closed its doors on 28 March 2014.

title: Stickhouse Gelato Icecreams on Stick
descriptionText:
The secret lies in the innovative Stickhouse production process, using natural ingredients, provides the natural quality following the old tradition of the Italian Gelato. The reason is Simple: The technology used to make Stickhouse Gelato really Creamy without air insufflation. The result is clear and perceptible to all, because the absence of air gives the product a persistent taste, without the need to use aromas, in a full-bodied structure typical of the traditional ice-cream. The ice cream Stickhouse is the result of 30 years of experience of ownership of the trademark. Our gelato on a stick has all the taste and freshness of handcrafted gelato, with 100% guaranteed genuine quality. A new idea of gelato: good, nutritional and healthy. Without preservatives. Without colourings. Without synthesis flavours. Without vegetable fats hydrogenated. Without synthesis emulsifier: mono-and diglycerides of fatty acids. The secret lies in the way we prepare our products: in addition to milk, cream and fruits in the case of sorbets, we use only 100% natural ingredients.

Flavours:
Gelato: Almond, Chocolate, Coconut, Coffee, Green Tea, Giuandia, Hazelnut, Milk, Mango milk, Mint, Pistachio, Vanilla
Sorbet: Guava, Lemon, Lychee, Mango, Orange, Pineapple, Pomegranate, Raspberry, Strawberry.
Yogurt: Yogurt, Strawberry yogurt, Mango yogurt, Raspberry yogurt

title: W Singapore - Sentosa Cove
descriptionText: Explore the pulse of a Glowing Jungle. Step through the doors of W Singapore Sentosa Cove - like the branches of a magical rainforest parting to reveal an exotic universe, explore a vibrant microcosm combining the island's resort's wild environs with the modern energy of the capital's entertainment centre. Enter our glowing jungle where untamed layers, distinct habitats and evocative textures enchant. Illuminated vegetation fuse with sleek stratospheres to blur the line between public spaces and private hideaways, and the organic and avant-garde mix and mingle with every adventurous turn and surprise around the corner.

title: Flame
descriptionText:
Singapore's first beach rotisserie, Flame, is a treat for any meat lover's senses! With mouthwatering
aromas of roast filling the air and the sizzling sounds of the grill, diners can watch
the chefs in action as they prepare the perfectly seasoned homemade dishes.

title: Makan²
descriptionText:
Makan² (pronounced Makan Makan) brings you the true taste of Asia. Get a dose of your
favourite local dishes, authentic North Indian cuisine and fresh fruit juices by the beach.
Satisfy your tastebuds for Asian foodfare while relishing the breathtaking view of Siloso
Beachfront.
It is as unpretentious as it can get.

title: Blue Lotus - Chinese Eating House
descriptionText:
Blue Lotus is a casual yet friendly venue serving classical Chinese dishes. The menu features traditional gems with signature dishes such as the Chilli Pomelo Crab and the King Prawn Truffle “Wonton” Soup. A wide selection of noodles, seafood and roasted meats will also be available.  

The Restaurant is the first Asian addition to the Emmanuel Stroobant Group, which already includes eight western restaurants in Singapore.

title: Sabio by the Sea, Tapas and Grill
descriptionText: A true Spanish experience with contemporary edge facing the Marina, and serving grilled meats and fishes along with an array of traditional tapas and a large selection of Spanish wines and beers. Soak up the nautical environment and spend the whole afternoon relaxing and enjoying Spanish cuisine.

title: Picotin Express
descriptionText: The well-loved European bistro, Picotin, from Bukit Timah fame, is opening their second outlet nestled amist the tropical resort living that is Senotsa Cove. Picotin Express casual dining will delight diners with its famously welcoming at mosphere, delightful Eruopean bistro fare and pizzeria. Cove residents will also enjoy the pizza delivery and catering services. The bistro is open for dine-in and delivery 7 days a week.

title: Mykonos On the Bay
descriptionText:
An original, genuine Greek Tavern, Mykonos on the Bay aims to offer the very best of the Greek culinary tradition and guests will enjoy the hospitality and fine home cooking that the country is famous for. 

The restaurant will serve authentic Greek cuisine, prepared simply and deliciously, using only the freshest and purest ingredients. The menu is going to feature a large selection of hot and cold meze (appetizers), and an array of classic salads, as well as a few innovations. Entrees will include many of the traditional dishes, a selection of charcoal-grilled meats and fish, and a few intriguing additions.

Our modern facility offers a variety of grooming options like creative pet styling, micro bubble spa, dental care and many more. We also bring in quality natural pet care products that are consistent with a holistic approach to pet health.

title: Skirt
descriptionText: Turn the heat up on a decadent dinner at SKIRT at W Singapore – Sentosa Cove, known amongst many to be one of the best restaurants in Sentosa. A trailblazing steakhouse, where prime cuts of meat and fresh seafood are beautifully prepared on the centrepiece parilla grill, placing us amongst the most favourite Sentosa Grill Restaurants.

title: The Kitchen Table
descriptionText: Welcome to the kitchen table at W Singapore – Sentosa Cove, the restaurant in Sentosa where giant overturned tables suspended from the ceiling set the tone for this whimsical eat-venture, and rubber ducky salt and pepper shakers and colourful cutlery on everyday add a dash of fun to convivial dining.

title: WOOBAR
descriptionText: Escape from the day and club in Sentosa at WOOBAR, W Singapore – Sentosa Cove to relax and recharge. In the afternoons, catch up on work or a book with a pick-me-up, or with friends over Drop The T², a daily decadence featuring Dilmah’s exotic Seasonal Flush tea blend harvested just one a year. An indulgent spread of high tea favourites is served in a standing bird cage that fits right in to the lobby’s urban jungle aesthetic.

descriptionText: Exploration that leads to new questions. Connections that come from knowing. Children at Quayside Isle Preparatory School experience Sentosa’s abundant natural beauty through frequent field trips followed by meaningful conversation and classroom activity.

title: Cove Stadium
descriptionText: Nestled in the much-anticipated premium F&B and lifestyle enclave of Quayside Isle at Sentosa Cove is Cove Stadium one of the largest F&B outlets in Sentosa Island,  At this exciting wine and dine playground, Cove Stadium is a unique sports bistro bar with a breath-taking view of the waterfront marina.

title: Astons Specialities
descriptionText: From its humble beginnings as a coffeeshop to an established name in the industry, Astons Specialities places its roots firmly along the idyllic waterfront of Resorts World™ Sentosa. This popular eatery has become synonymous with great food, superb value and friendly service. Add to that the casual, laid back ambience on the waterfront and we give you an experience to savour.

title: Malaysian Food Street
descriptionText:
Malaysian Food Street is one dining destination not to be missed! We created a unique old-town ambience to flavour the experience of indulging in some of Malaysia's finest and famous hawker fare.
Authentic dishes from around the Peninsula range from KL Claypot Rice to Penang Hokkien Mee to Klang Bak Kut Teh and much more.

title: Trick Eye Museum
descriptionText: Trick Eye is short for ‘Trick of the eye’, which refers to an art technique that turns two-dimensional paintings into three-dimensional images through the use of optical illusions. With that, 2D paintings on the museum walls, floors and ceilings appear to pop out of the surface and come to life. Visitors are more than welcome to explore the various themed galleries with their eyes, hands and even cameras. Step inside the paintings to complete a visual narrative with your creative poses, and watch a “tricky” story unfold before your camera.
admission:

title: Imperial Treasure La Mian Xiao Long Bao
descriptionText: At Imperial Treasure La Mian Xiao Long Bao our handmade noodles are thick and soft, tempering the spicy and sublime soups that fill your mouth with full-bodied flavour. The xiao long bao are deftly crafted by our master chefs, retaining their authentic taste and texture – fine, hand-rolled skins that seal the thick broth within, yet yield their contents with one bite.

title: Bali Thai
descriptionText: Balithai celebrates the timeless love for art, culture and great food that both Indonesia and Thailand are famous for. Listen to the symphony of ingredients cracking, grilling, tossing, pounding, sizzling to the rhythm of the place. Smell the wafting aromas of fragrant herbs and spices. Savour the combination of sweet, sour, spicy and salty tastes that tantalize your taste buds. With our wonderful menu of mains and appetizers all day, you would be spoilt for choice. Balithai is the destination for anytime feast for all your senses. This is where Thairiffic meets Indolicious!

title: Putien
descriptionText:
Since its humble beginnings in Singapore in 2000, Putien has become renowned for authentic home-style Heng Hwa cuisine and has been voted as one of Singapore's best 50 restaurants.

 The restaurant is noted for its signature dishes, including the Braised Pig Intestine, Fried "Hing Wa" Bee Hoon and Braised Beancurd with Chinese Cabbage. Complemented by warm and friendly service, Putien promises an enriching dining experience.

title: Starbucks (Resorts World Sentosa)
descriptionText: Since 1971, Starbucks Coffee Company has been committed to ethically sourcing and roasting the highest quality arabica coffee in the world. Today, with stores around the globe, the company is the premier roaster and retailer of specialty coffee in the world. Through our unwavering commitment to excellence and our guiding principles, we bring the unique Starbucks Experience to life for every customer through every cup.

title: Just Like It
descriptionText:
By using liquid nitrogen to make ice-cream, we have preserved the nutritious goodness of the ingredients. And made it possible to serve you your favourite dessert, freshly made on the spot – only after you have made your selection from a menu of popular flavours, including the bestselling Durian Durian! 

It’s 0% stabilisers, 0% additives, 0% colouring, 100% natural.

title: Din Tai Fung
descriptionText:
Awarded one Michelin Star and ranked as one of the world's Top Ten Best Restaurants by The New York Times, this celebrated authentic Taiwanese restaurant is famous for its xiao long baos (Steamed Pork Dumplings) with 18 intricate folds, and Steamed Chicken Soup.

 Now, followers of these delicious dumplings can also delight in a sumptuous line-up of Singapore-style seafood and a myriad of local favourites such as the fragrant Nonya Curry Fish Head in Clay Pot and Szechuan Wok-fried Diced Chicken with Sun-dried Chillies & Toasted Cashews, exclusively at Din Tai Fung at Resorts World Sentosa.

title: COCA Restaurant
descriptionText: The name of our restaurant, COCA, was derived from the Chinese word "kekou" meaning "appetising". Since 1957, COCA Restaurant has lived up to its name by offering delectable Thai-style steamboat specialties with only the freshest and finest ingredients. Combined with our all-natural COCA sauce, the healthy goodness of COCA steamboat dining makes this an experience of pure delight.

title: Singapore Cable Car Station @ Sentosa
descriptionText: Whether you are looking for something to remind you of your adventures in Singapore or in our unique cable cars, visit our retail shops and take home some keepsakes from your day of fun!

title: Smoothie King
descriptionText: Established in New Orleans, Smoothie King is internationally known for its nutritious fresh blended smoothies. Choose from a wide variety of delicious creamy smoothies blended with real fruit and all natural ingredients. Healthy and delicious chilled wraps are also served, pair them with your smoothie for the perfect guilt-free meal!

title: Gong Cha
descriptionText:
With an offering of more than 70 different drink combinations, Gong Cha offers the finest freshly brewed tea, coffee and also juice concoctions; every drink is brewed daily with high-quality ingredients that leave our customers happy and healthy.
One that’s new to Gong Cha must give our “House Specials” a try; each drink concoction consists of our popular Gong Cha Milk froth that gives the drink a rich body and leaves milk lovers wanting more!

title: Madame Tussauds Singapore
title_zh_SG: 新加坡杜莎夫人蜡像馆
descriptionText:
Bringing our unique blend of glitz and glamour, Madame Tussauds Singapore will take you to a party like no other! With 8 fully themed interactive zones and the new "Spirit of Singapore" boat ride, get ready to photograph and pose with your favourite A-Listers, challenge sports stars, hop on stage with music legends and come face to face with international icons from Singapore, Asia and beyond. 

Sports - Fast paced and interactive, the sports zone let you challenge your sporting heroes from the world of basketball, table tennis and football and boxing. Don’t forget to play the hoops in our basketball zone and challenge football starts in our penalty zone!

Music - Meet legends from past and present, jump on stage and join the band, perform with Lady Gaga and master the Jackson lean! 

Film - Film starts with the romance and elegance of early classic Hollywood before the theming turns into a movie studio backlot! Movie cameras, lighting rigs and much more will give you the illusion that you are amongst a real movie set!

A-List - Pose for the paparazzi and get ready to socialise with the A-List on the red carpet, including Hollywood favourites Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt. Mingle with many more celebrities from Singapore and beyond!

Notice:
The Spirit of Singapore boat ride will be closed for maintenance from 18 – 20 May 2015.
descriptionText_zh_SG:
作为全球最受欢迎的蜡像馆与非凡名人体验馆，杜莎夫人蜡像馆以其高超的制作技艺、栩栩入生的蜡像和现代化的特殊场馆布置，为各年龄层的游客带来非同凡响的体验，赢得了广泛的认可和青睐。

馆内拥有8 种不同的风貌展区，让来此的游客能与世界级的明星零距离接触、互动、以及合影。另外，游客也可体验新增的游船河之旅，探索新加坡的发展历史。

title: The Good Sole
descriptionText: Providing a fresh, young take on dull foot reflexology centres of the past, The Good Sole aims to provide luxurious body and foot massages in a tranquil, clean and modern setting. Incorporating aromatherapy, therapeutic oils and tried-and-tested massage techniques, indulge in relaxing rubdowns on pressure points to ease tense muscles, relieve stress and restore balance to the body and mind.

title: Insadong Korea Town
descriptionText:
Outlet will be closed for refurbishment starting from 26th of Sep 2014 and will remain closed until further notice.

Topshield F&B Holdings Pte Ltd was an integral part in creating one of Singapore’s largest restaurants specializing in Korean food, Insadong Korea Town, at Resort World Sentosa. At 6,000 square feet with a capacity of over 300 diners, Insadong Korea Town offers an assortment of over 30 types of the most popular and authentic Korean cuisine. For the first time in Singapore, you can look forward to dining in a setting which is a replica of the famous Insadong Korea Street, one of the most memorable attractions in Seoul and represents the focal point of Korean traditional cuisine, culture and crafts. 

With a team of experienced chefs specialising in authentic Korean recipes brought in from Korea, and food supplies air flown direct from Korea, Insadong Korea Town presents a unique dining experience for anyone expecting the best from the Korean culture. Savour the best authentic Korean food in Korean traditional setting. Insadong Korea Town is a great place to relax and enjoy great food with your friends and family after a day of fun at Resorts World Sentosa.

title: Aileron Wellness
descriptionText: A boutique gym with a state-of-the-art training facility and certified trainers to help individuals break new grounds, Aileron Wellness is Singapore's prime ground for health and fitness education, and a sanctuary for self-discovery and empowerment.  Aileron Wellness stays at the forefront of the health and fitness sphere with unconventional methods and concepts of training developed with leading educators from around the world, ensuring effective and long-lasting results. Guided by the belief that wellness goes beyond skin-deep, Aileron Wellness brings to its clients, adults and children alike, an all-encompassing suite of knowledge to balance the body, mind and soul. The result is an elevated sense of well-being.
admission: From $35 per 1-hour session onwards (10-session package)

title: Crystal Jade Premium
descriptionText: Designed with a flair for the modern, elegant and pleasing to the senses, Crystal Jade Premium serves a culinary experience that is perfect for both private and corporate dining experiences.

title: Sentosa Cable Car
descriptionText:
Arrive at Sentosa: The State of Fun in style. The station is located at Imbiah Lookout with 11 attractions within 6 minutes walking distance within one another.

Two experiences, One joy of a ride

Experience a 360-degree visual treat of the entire Sentosa-HarbourFront skyline from the top, when you go on the Singapore Cable Car joyride. 

From June 2015 onwards, the Singapore Cable Car will not just connect you from Mount Faber to Sentosa Island – you will also be able to ride into and around Sentosa, The State of Fun. 

Double your joy in the sky on two cable car lines – the Mount Faber Line, and the new Sentosa Line, which will fly you across three new stations to over 20 attractions including Resorts World Sentosa, Madame Tussauds, Sentosa Merlion and Siloso Beach.

Don’t miss Singapore’s only hilltop destination, Faber Peak Singapore with its relaxing greenery, dining-with-a-view and vibrant entertainment!
admission:
Adult: S$26 
Child: S$15 
(Prices include Sentosa island admission)
openingTimes:
8.45am - 10pm daily

Closure of Singapore Cable Car ride
The Singapore Cable Car will be closed from 13 to 15 January 2014 for planned maintenance. Normal cable car operations will resume on 16 January 2014 (Thursday) at 1.30pm.
